text: William Henry Greer (28 February 1872 – 1937) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Darwen and Preston North End. ==References== Category:1872 births Category:1937 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players Category:Darwen F.C. players Category:Preston North End F.C. players
title: Billy Greer (footballer)
